title: looking to join a 5's  ranked  team
body: I am bronze 5. looking for people that are willing to help me get better they can be any rank just want to play with a team and not all randoms

replies.body: Would you be interested in playing a support role on Knights of the 5th Realm? Check this link if you take an interest http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/hEj1Rk2z-knight-of-the-5th-realm-kot5r
